de.iss.mv2.gui

Class EditableListView<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.iss.mv2.gui.EditableListView<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the elements to display.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

    public class EditableListView<T>
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    A component to display an editable list.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
